ygData.subject: Guise of the Deceiver question
ygData.msgSnippet: I was concerned that when in dark elf form I would be attacked by the guards and inhabitants of the good aligned cities I am normally looked upon kindly or
ygData.messageBody:
I was concerned that when in dark elf form I would be attacked by the guards
and inhabitants of the good aligned cities I am normally looked upon kindly
or warmly by, but this is not the case. Apparently you keep all your
faction adjustments while under the dark elf illusion of the guise.

My question is, is it useful in any way to by disguised as a dark elf when
attempting to enter the evil aligned cities or is the mask's illusion just
some nice eye-candy that gives you infravision?

-Faras
